title: Alecrins
body: Site of the parish of Santo Antonio do Funchal, where the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Quietação, built in 1670 by Lourenço de Matos Coutinho, once stood, who made it the seat of the Alecrins entail established in 1577, and today Dr. Rui Betencourt da Câmara is the representative of this entailed house.

Lourenço de Matos Coutinho: Founder of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Quietação

1670: Construction of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Quietação
